column1: Kata Robata////If this is Houston's best Omakase/ sushi
column2: then the bar is set really
column3: really low. Perhaps it's because I'm used to NYC
column7: I would definitely have been happier with sushi from the grocery store. Lunch was $100. The nigiri was dry and tasteless. The rolls were blah. The fresh grated wasabi was watery. Not worth it. Maybe if the total bill had come out to $30 I would have rated it 3 stars. But
